item.title: Common Docker Commands
item.description: General Commands docker images docker pull docker create docker ps docker attach 3378689f2069 Deleting, cleanup docker run â€”rm image_name docker system prune docker container prune docker network prune docker image prune Ubuntu Image docker pull ubuntu docker run -d -t ubuntu # run detached docker run -it ubuntu /bin/bash docker exec -it <containername> /bin/bash apt-get update docker compose run -it web /bin/bash Anaconda Image docker pull continuumio/anaconda3 docker run -it continuumio/anaconda3 /bin/bash Set up gui: https://dev.
